topComments.author: R Lin
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Halloween Horror Nights √© um evento EPIC! As pessoas ficam furiosas com isso o tempo todo e, quando o fazem, n√£o est√£o exagerando, √© t√£o legal!  Definitivamente, n√£o √© para quem tem cora√ß√£o fraco. Este √© um evento intenso de Halloween que s√≥ deve ser atendido por quem tiver condi√ß√µes. Eu nem me considero uma pessoa de Halloween, na verdade odeio casas mal-assombradas, mas realmente gostei de vir aqui depois que me acostumei. Ent√£o voc√™ tamb√©m pode fazer isso!  O que eu gosto no evento da Universals √© que eles mapearam "zonas de susto" no parque, onde existem configura√ß√µes tem√°ticas e pessoas andando por a√≠ que podem assustar voc√™. Mas o resto do parque est√° livre para caminhar e alguns passeios ainda est√£o funcionando. Foi divertido ver tudo o que eles inventaram. Minha recomenda√ß√£o √© n√£o fazer contato visual com nenhum dos atores ou eles certamente v√£o te atacar e tentar te assustar rs.  E as casas, o prato principal- essas eram uma loucura !!! De 10 a 11 casas no total, acredito, o que me deixou perplexo, o fato de que elas s√£o capazes de acomodar tantas casas nos parques. H√° um tema para quase todos os interesses, mas voc√™ pode querer priorizar os que escolher, a menos que consiga um passe r√°pido, porque voc√™ vai esperar um minuto quente em algumas das filas. Mas vale a pena! Eu odeio casas mal-assombradas, mas acabei amando essas depois de passar por algumas e ver o qu√£o criativas elas ficam!  Definitivamente um evento para voltar !!  (Original) Halloween Horror Nights is an EPIC event! People rage about it all the time, and when they do they really aren‚Äôt overplaying it, this is so cool!  It‚Äôs definitely not for the faint of heart. This is an intense Halloween event that should only be attended by those who can handle it. I don‚Äôt even consider myself a Halloween person, I actually hate haunted houses but I did really enjoy coming here after I got used to it. So you can do it too!  What I like about Universals‚Äô event is that they have mapped out ‚Äúscare zones‚Äù in the park where there are themed setups and people walking around who are allowed to scare you. But the rest of the park is free to walk and some rides are still running. It was fun seeing what all they came up with. My recommendation is to not make eye contact with any of the actors or they will surely target you and try to scare you lol.  And the houses, the main course- those were insane!!! 10-11 houses in total I believe which blew my mind that they are even able to fit that many into the parks. There‚Äôs a theme for just about every interest but you may want to prioritize which ones you choose unless you get a fast pass, because you‚Äôll wait a hot minute in some of the lines. But it‚Äôs worth it! I hate haunted houses but ended up loving these ones after going through a few and seeing just how creative they get!  Definitely an event to come back to!!

topComments.author: Eduardo M.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um dos melhores eventos que a Universal realiza para a temporada de Halloween... Existem v√°rias casas com temas de filmes, personagens e outros sobre Halloween... As desvantagens s√£o que as filas s√£o muito longas e que fui em 2021 que ainda est√°vamos em uma pandemia... As casas de terror n√£o v√£o te assustar o suficiente como eu pensava, mas tudo est√° muito bem preparado com bons cen√°rios e personagens... Devido a pandemia havia pain√©is de prote√ß√£o e voc√™ j√° sabia onde ia aparecer a pessoa que ia assustar voc√™ e tamb√©m como havia bastante gente e voc√™ viu onde eles assustaram a pessoa que estava na sua frente, isso n√£o causou mais surpresa... No parque havia zonas de medo onde voc√™ encontrava personagens aterrorizantes... Resumindo, 100% recomendado...  (Original) Es uno de los mejores eventos que realiza universal para la √©poca de halloween... Existen varias casas con tem√°ticas de pel√≠culas, personajes y dem√°s sobre halloween... Las desventajas es que las filas son muy largas y eso que fui en el 2021 que aun est√°bamos en pandemia... Las casas de terror no es que te van a hacer asustar bastante como yo pens√© pero todo esta preparado muy bien con buenas escenograf√≠as y personajes... Debido a la pandemia exist√≠an paneles protectores y tu ya sabias donde iba a aparecer la persona que te iba a asustar y tambi√©n como era bastante gente y veias en donde asustaban a la persona que estaba adelante tuyo ya no te causaba sorpresa... En parque exist√≠an zonas de miedo en donde te encontrabas con terror√≠ficos personajes... En fin 100% recomendado...

topComments.author: Crystal King
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s amamos noites de terror de Halloween, nunca desilude, estaremos de volta no pr√≥ximo ano. N√£o deixe que todas as cr√≠ticas negativas mudem de ideia, obtenha o passe expresso e divirta-se! Obrigado universal üòò  (Original) We Loved Halloween Horror nights, it never disappoints ,we will be back next year. Don't let all the bad reviews change your mind ,get the express pass and enjoy ! Thanks universal üòò

topComments.author: Ya Boy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A experi√™ncia foi definitivamente um pouco menos divertida por causa de todas as restri√ß√µes do covid, mas ainda assim foi √≥tima, todos est√£o de bom humor e assustados. Espero que no pr√≥ximo ano eles possam descobrir todo o problema do covid.  (Original) The experience was definitely a little less fun because of all the covid restrictions but it was still a great one, everyone is in a good scared mood. I hope next year they can figure out the whole covid problem.

topComments.author: Amy Reed
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Minha primeira noite de terror no Halloween foi em 1992! Tenho um amor especial por HHN. No entanto, sempre consigo o Express Pass para n√£o ficar na fila por 45, 85, 95 minutos ou mais. Se voc√™ tem um grupo grande, esperar nas filas n√£o √© t√£o ruim, mas ainda assim, considere o Express Pass se puder! Fizemos todas as 10 casas este ano e terminamos √†s 23h. Isso √© com alguns passeios tamb√©m. Recomendo ir ao parque cedo e depois esperar em um dos cercados. Eu adoro o da Duff Brewery, j√° que normalmente voc√™ consegue bebidas r√°pidas enquanto espera o in√≠cio do HHN. Eu sempre pego o copo de souvenir para economizar dinheiro. Normalmente, voc√™ pode economizar US $ 4 por bebida se pegar o copo, mas ele muda a cada ano.  (Original) My first Halloween Horror Nights was in 1992! I have a special love for HHN. However, I always get the Express Pass as to not wait in lines for 45, 85, 95 minutes or more. If you have a large group, waiting in the lines isn't as bad, but still, consider the Express Pass if you can! We did all 10 houses this year and were done by 11pm. That's with riding a few rides too. I recommend going into the park early, then waiting in one of the holding pens. I love the one by Duff Brewery as you can usually get quick drinks while you wait for HHN to start. I always get the souvenir drink cup to save money, you can usually save $4 per drink if you get the cup but it does change every year.

topComments.author: Brian M
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Universal Studios halloween horor nights √© de longe a melhor experi√™ncia de casa mal-assombrada em orlando e na Fl√≥rida, mas talvez voc√™ precise pagar a mais por passes r√°pidos, h√° muitas pessoas e pode ficar muito caro.  (Original) Universal studios halloween horor nights is by far the Best haunted house experience in orlando and Florida but you may need to pay extra for fast passes, there are a lot of people, and it can get very expensive.

topComments.author: Rolando Fortis
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O evento em si e todo o seu conte√∫do foi incr√≠vel. Meu problema foi que me foi cobrado o pre√ßo total para o meu beb√™ de 4 meses. Entendo que crian√ßas menores de 13 anos n√£o foram recomendadas para participar, mas em NENHUM lugar encontrei algo que dizia que eu seria cobrado por um beb√™. N√≥s voamos para l√° do Texas e n√£o tivemos escolha a n√£o ser levar meu beb√™, e nosso plano era alternar observ√°-la em √°reas de descanso durante nossa visita. As pessoas do port√£o da frente foram extremamente rudes, bem como as pessoas da bilheteria. Eles disseram que, embora deixem crian√ßas entrarem gratuitamente durante o dia, cobram durante o evento noturno de Halloween para ‚Äúdesencorajar‚Äù as pessoas de trazer crian√ßas. Isso est√° roubando as pessoas aos meus olhos!  (Original) The event itself and all of its content was amazing. My issue was that I was charged full price for my 4 month old. I understand that children under the age of 13 were not recommended to attend but NOWHERE did I find something that said I would be charged for an infant. We flew there from Texas and had no choice but to take my baby, and our plan was to alternate watching her in resting areas throughout our visit. The front gate people were extremely rude as well as the ticket booth people. They said that even though they let infants in free during the day they charge during the night Halloween event to ‚Äúdiscourage‚Äù people from bringing kids. That‚Äôs robbing people in my eyes!

topComments.author: Victoria Viera
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia fant√°stica. Quase como estar em um filme real. Eu n√£o estava nem um pouco incomodado com os atores por tr√°s do plexiglass. Esteja preparado para esperar mais de 45 minutos para entrar nas casas.  (Original) Fantastic experience. Almost like being in an actual movie. I wasn‚Äôt bothered at all about the actors behind the plexiglass. Just be prepared to wait more than 45 mins to enter the houses.

topComments.author: John V
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um dos maiores eventos de halloween do mundo. Muito en√©rgico a partir do momento em que voc√™ entra. N√£o √© uma casa mal-assombrada local comum. A comida era med√≠ocre, mas quem vai ao HHN pela comida mesmo assim. As multid√µes s√£o loucas, mas por um bom motivo. Foi nossa primeira vez, e n√≥s voamos de Ohio, ent√£o conseguimos passes r√°pidos. Eles valem a pena o pricetag de domingo √† noite se voc√™ tiver apenas 1 noite para participar. Caso contr√°rio, eu n√£o os pegaria. N√£o tenho outros anos para comparar este HHN. Dito isso, eu tinha grandes expectativas indo ... Quer dizer ... √© universal! HHN superou minhas expectativas. Estaremos de volta ... novamente e novamente.  (Original) One of the greatest halloween events in the world. Very energetic from the moment you walk in.  Not your average local haunted houses.   Food was mediocre, but who goes to HHN for the food anyway.  Crowds are insane but for good reason.  It was our first time, and we flew in from Ohio, so we got fast passes.  They are well worth the Sunday night pricetag if you only have 1 night to attend. Otherwise i wouldnt get them.   I have no other years to compare this HHN to.  That being said, I had high expetations going in...I mean... its Universal!  HHN went way above my expectations.  We will be back... again and again and again.

topComments.author: Derek Townsley
topComments.comment: Halloween Horror Nights is THE most immersive experience that Orlando has to offer. You want a haunt unlike any other? Visit HHN. They delivery with quality sets, world class entertainment and one heck of thrill! See everyone in the fog..

topComments.author: Judah Cannarella
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Halloween Horror Nights is the best nightly Halloween event ever to hit Universal Studios Florida! The next HHN event in 2022 should be called "Halloween Horror Nights XXIII: Never Go Alone", and has to be the scariest HHN event ever since the number, 31, is equivalent to the day number of October which happens to be the most terrifying holiday in o mundo!  The Icons for HHN 31 should be all twelve of the scariest Icons ever:  Jack the Clown (the head Icon)  Chance  Maria Sangrenta  O zelador  O contador de Hist√≥rias  O diretor  The Usher  Temer  The Terra Queen  Eddie Schmidt  and Cindy Caine  The ten haunted houses for the event should be based on the most terrifying movies ever made with four of them being based on the horror movies that were composed by the best movie music composer in the history of horror movies, Jerry Goldsmith:  Poltergeist (1982) (which was one of the ten haunted houses for Halloween Horror Nights XXVIII in 2018)  Alien (1979)  Gremlins (1984)  and The Omen (1976)  The other six haunted houses should be based on other horror classics:  Universal Monsters: Legends Collide (1931, 1932, 1941)  It (2017)  Halloween (1978)  Scream (1996)  The Horrors of Blumhouse: Freaky and the Black Phone (2020 and 2022)  and A Quiet Place (2018)  The crew of Universal Studios can also just develop their ideas for the rest of the three haunted houses to be based on other horror movies, television shows, or originals  The five scare zones for the event should both be based on horror movies or originals:  31 Nights of October (Original)  Gremlin Hollow (Gremlins)  Universal Monsters: Scareathon (Universal Monsters)  Red Balloon Carnival (It)  Blumhouse Con (Blumhouse Productions)  The US crew can also develop ideas for four of the five scare zones to be based on other horror movies, television shows, or originals.  The entertainment should include:  HHN Icons Tribute: a stage show hosted by the twelve HHN Icons  Marathon of Mayhem: Fountains of Night Terror: a nighttime fountain show featuring: The HHN Icons, The Universal Monsters: Frankenstein (1931), The Bride of Frankenstein (1935), Dracula (1931), The Wolf Man (1941), The Phantom of the Opera (1925), The Creature from the Black Lagoon (1954), The Mummy (1932), and The Invisible Man (1933), and the four Jerry Goldsmith horror movies: Poltergeist (1982), Alien (1979), Gremlins (1984), and The Omen (1976)  and The Centuries of Halloween Parade: a nighttime parade that will be scheduled only on weekends, featuring six segments: "Beginning of Halloween Night" (with the HHN Icons, and other classic horror movies, including Carrie (1976), The Silence of the Lambs (1991), The Ring (2002), Hellraiser (1987), the Exorcist (1973), Trick 'r' Treat (2007), Friday the 13th (1980), the Texas Chainsaw Massacre (1974), Halloween (1978), Scream (1996), Nightmare on Elm Street (1984), and An American Werewolf in London (1981)) "Horrifying Novels of Stephen King" (with It (2017) and the Shining (1980) "Scary Music of Jerry Goldsmith" (with the Omen (1976), Gremlins (1984), Poltergeist (1982), and Alien (1979)) "Terror of Television Shows" (with Stranger Things (2016) and The Walking Dead (2010)) "Fear of Living Toys" (with Annabelle (2014), Saw (2004), and Chucky (2021)) and "Finale of Universal Horror Classics" (with The Birds (1963) Psycho (1960), Frankenstein (1931), the Bride of Frankenstein (1935), Dracula (1931), The Wolf Man (1941), The Phantom of the Opera (1925), The Creature From the Black Lagoon (1954), The Mummy (1932), and The Invisible Man (1933)).  If those ideas fit with this Halloween Horror Nights event, then fans of horror will call the event the scariest and nightmarish HHN event ever to hit Universal Studios!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  (Original) Halloween Horror Nights is the best nightly Halloween event ever to hit Universal Studios Florida! The next HHN event in 2022 should be called "Halloween Horror Nights XXIII: Never Go Alone", and has to be the scariest HHN event ever since the number, 31, is equivalent to the day number of October which happens to be the most terrifying holiday in the world!  The Icons for HHN 31 should be all twelve of the scariest Icons ever:  Jack the Clown (the head Icon)  Chance  Bloody Mary  The Caretaker  The Storyteller  The Director  The Usher  Fear  The Terra Queen  Eddie Schmidt  and Cindy Caine  The ten haunted houses for the event should be based on the most terrifying movies ever made with four of them being based on the horror movies that were composed by the best movie music composer in the history of horror movies, Jerry Goldsmith:  Poltergeist (1982) (which was one of the ten haunted houses for Halloween Horror Nights XXVIII in 2018)  Alien (1979)  Gremlins (1984)  and The Omen (1976)  The other six haunted houses should be based on other horror classics:  Universal Monsters: Legends Collide (1931, 1932, 1941)  It (2017)  Halloween (1978)  Scream (1996)  The Horrors of Blumhouse: Freaky and the Black Phone (2020 and 2022)  and A Quiet Place (2018)  The crew of Universal Studios can also just develop their ideas for the rest of the three haunted houses to be based on other horror movies, television shows, or originals  The five scare zones for the event should both be based on horror movies or originals:  31 Nights of October (Original)  Gremlin Hollow (Gremlins)  Universal Monsters: Scareathon (Universal Monsters)  Red Balloon Carnival (It)  Blumhouse Con (Blumhouse Productions)  The US crew can also develop ideas for four of the five scare zones to be based on other horror movies, television shows, or originals.  The entertainment should include:  HHN Icons Tribute: a stage show hosted by the twelve HHN Icons  Marathon of Mayhem: Fountains of Night Terror: a nighttime fountain show featuring: The HHN Icons, The Universal Monsters: Frankenstein (1931), The Bride of Frankenstein (1935), Dracula (1931), The Wolf Man (1941), The Phantom of the Opera (1925), The Creature from the Black Lagoon (1954), The Mummy (1932), and The Invisible Man (1933), and the four Jerry Goldsmith horror movies: Poltergeist (1982), Alien (1979), Gremlins (1984), and The Omen (1976)  and The Centuries of Halloween Parade: a nighttime parade that will be scheduled only on weekends, featuring six segments: "Beginning of Halloween Night" (with the HHN Icons, and other classic horror movies, including Carrie (1976), The Silence of the Lambs (1991), The Ring (2002), Hellraiser (1987), the Exorcist (1973), Trick 'r' Treat (2007), Friday the 13th (1980), the Texas Chainsaw Massacre (1974), Halloween (1978), Scream (1996), Nightmare on Elm Street (1984), and An American Werewolf in London (1981)) "Horrifying Novels of Stephen King" (with It (2017) and the Shining (1980) "Scary Music of Jerry Goldsmith" (with the Omen (1976), Gremlins (1984), Poltergeist (1982), and Alien (1979)) "Terror of Television Shows" (with Stranger Things (2016) and The Walking Dead (2010)) "Fear of Living Toys" (with Annabelle (2014), Saw (2004), and Chucky (2021)) and "Finale of Universal Horror Classics" (with The Birds (1963) Psycho (1960), Frankenstein (1931), the Bride of Frankenstein (1935), Dracula (1931), The Wolf Man (1941), The Phantom of the Opera (1925), The Creature From the Black Lagoon (1954), The Mummy (1932), and The Invisible Man (1933)).  If those ideas fit with this Halloween Horror Nights event, then fans of horror will call the event the scariest and nightmarish HHN event ever to hit Universal Studios!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

topComments.author: Jeremy Taunton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ame os dois parques! Essa √© uma maneira segura de passar o tempo.  (Original) Love both parks! This is a safe way to spend time.

topComments.author: Christine H
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As casas mal-assombradas eram apenas uma linha cont√≠nua de pessoas que entravam juntas. Espa√ßamento zero entre quaisquer grupos. Definitivamente foi apressado tamb√©m. Nenhuma m√°scara aplicada. Plexiglass era onde os personagens estavam, ent√£o n√£o havia nenhum fator de medo real. Alimentos e bebidas eram bons. Os personagens nas ruas eram todos incr√≠veis e definitivamente a melhor parte. Park estava muito lotado, mais ainda durante o dia normal.  (Original) The haunted houses were just a continuous line of people going in all together. Zero spacing between any groups. Definitely was rushed through as well. No mask enforced at all. Plexiglass was where the characters were so there was no real scare factor. Food and drinks were good. Characters in the streets were all amazing and definitely the best part. Park was very very crowed, more so then during the regular day.

topComments.author: Aaron *
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) As filas s√£o muito longas. As casas mal-assombradas t√™m vidro plexi, ent√£o voc√™ sabe onde os atores v√£o aparecer. As linhas s√£o apertadas por dentro para que voc√™ possa ver onde est√£o todos os ‚Äúsustos‚Äù. Os visuais e designs s√£o √≥timos! O show ao vivo da loucura maratona foi a melhor parte. Nada √© assustador neste lugar  (Original) The lines are very long. The haunted houses have plexi glass ,so you know where the actors are going to pop up. The lines are tight inside so you can see where all the ‚Äúscares‚Äù are. The visuals and designs are great though! The marathon madness live show was the best part. Nothing is scary about this place

topComments.author: Albert Maury
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o desperdice seu tempo ou dinheiro. Resumindo, voc√™ est√° gastando $ 71,00 para a Universal reabrir o 1 parque √†s 18h30. Apenas alguns carros operando e casas mal-assombradas sem brilho. Fique na fila por uma hora para caminhar por uma casa mal assombrada em menos de 5 minutos. Como era um pr√©dio do tipo armaz√©m convertido, n√£o era nada assustador. Foi a √∫ltima noite de nossa viagem de 4 dias, que foi, na melhor das hip√≥teses, med√≠ocre. Primeira e √∫ltima vez no Universal Studios ... √â uma fraude em todos os lugares que voc√™ virar.  (Original) Don't waste your time or money.  In short, you are spending $71.00 for Universal to reopen the 1 park at 6:30 pm.  Only a couple of rides operating and lackluster haunted houses.  Stand in line for an hour to walk through a Haunted House in less than 5 minutes.  Since it was a converted warehouse type building, it wasn't scary at all.  It was the final night of our 4 day trip, which was mediocre at best.  First and last time to Universal Studios....It's a ripoff everywhere you turn.

topComments.author: Reckless Gamer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu realmente amo noites de terror. Mas definitivamente precisa comprar o passe r√°pido se n√£o quiser esperar em filas de 2 horas.  (Original) I really love horror nights. But definitely need to buy the fast pass if you don't wanna wait in 2 hour lines.

topComments.author: Kristafur Dixon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Estava extremamente animado para ir √†s noites de terror de Halloween, mas ao inv√©s disso, fiquei extremamente desapontado. Com o or√ßamento universal para trabalhar, a experi√™ncia geral foi desanimadora. as filas eram mais longas do que o parque diurno. Eles n√£o separaram os grupos em todas as casas mal-assombradas, eles te apressam e te fazem acompanhar as pessoas na sua frente. Nenhum dos monstros √© assustador .. √© literalmente uma caminhada que voc√™ tem que esperar 2 horas na fila para cada casa e custar $ 130 para entrar. Nunca mais voltarei √†s noites de terror de Halloween !!!  (Original) Was extremely excited to go to Halloween horror nights, but was extremely disappointed instead.  With the budget universal has to work with, the overall experience was underwhelming.  the lines were longer than the day time park . They didn't separate the groups at all going thru the haunted houses, they rush you and make you keep up with the ppl in front of you . None of the monsters are scary.. it's literally  a walk through that you have to wait 2 hours in line for each house and  cost $130 to get in. Will never go back to Halloween horror nights!!!

topComments.author: Devin More
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√£o v√°! Voltei alguns anos e foi um grande momento. Este ano me senti como se tivesse sido roubado. Quase n√£o havia gente correndo por a√≠ nos assustando. As casas eram t√£o previs√≠veis. As filas duravam de uma hora a duas horas. Eles o empurram para fora de casa se voc√™ seguir seu pr√≥prio ritmo. A comida √© nojenta. √â horr√≠vel!!!  (Original) Don‚Äôt go! I came a couple years back and it was a great time. This year I felt like I was robbed. There was barely any people running around scaring us. The houses were so predictable. The lines were an hour to two hours. They rush you out of the house if you go at your own pace. The food is disgusting. It is awful!!!

topComments.author: Townsley Filmer
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Melhor. Experi√™ncia. SEMPRE. Ansiosos para as emo√ß√µes e calafrios e detalhes incr√≠veis ano ap√≥s ano. HHN31, aqui vamos n√≥s!üòà  (Original) Best. Experience. EVER. Look forward to the thrills and chills and incredible details year after year. HHN31, here we come!üòà

topComments.author: Chef Bored
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu adoraria ir este ano! Parece ser um dos, se n√£o o melhor evento de Halloween em qualquer parque tem√°tico em qualquer lugar!  (Original) I would love to go this year! It looks to be one of, if not the best Halloween events at any theme park anywhere!
